phrase.cizu_name: be on the lookout (或 keep a lookout for)

lj.lj_ly: he told them to be on the lookout for dangerous gas.
lj.lj_ls: 他告诉他们小心有害气体。

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 软件名称: lookout 版本: v6.02 发行时间: 2005年 制作发行: NI 地区: 美国 软件简介： NI Lookout是市场上可见最方便易用的HMI/SCADA软件。其简便的联网性能，及与当今所使用的大量硬件迅速连接的特性，使lookout在大幅度提高用户开发效率的同时，还降低了工程设计和维护的费用。您只需要简单将物件连接，即可完成分散式I/O和PLC的连接，快速增加控制逻辑、报警计算和用户界面的开发。Lookout为应用程序提供可缩放的架

entry.def: A lookout is a place from which you can see clearly in all directions.

example.ex: Troops tried to set up a lookout post inside a refugee camp.
example.tran: 部队试图在难民营里设一个瞭望哨。

entry.def: A lookout is someone who is watching for danger in order to warn other people about it.
If someone keeps a lookout, especially on a boat, they look around all the time in order to make sure there is no danger.

example.ex: He denied that he'd  failed to keep a proper lookout that night.

entry.def: If you are keeping a lookout for something or are on the lookout for it, you are alert and careful about it, either because you do not want to miss it or because it will be unpleasant or harmful and you need to avoid it.

example.ex: Keep a lookout for a nasty little organization calling itself Defence Through Strength...
example.tran: 要警惕一个自称“实力防卫”的可恶组织。

example.ex: Nature lovers will be on the lookout for eagles, cormorants, and the occasional whale.
example.tran: 自然爱好者要密切留意鹰、鸬鹚和偶尔出现的鲸鱼。

means.word_mean: 1. a person employed to watch for something to happen
2. an elevated post affording a wide view
3. a structure commanding a wide view of its surroundings

sentences.en: It’s a bad lookout for the company if interest rates don’t come down.
sentences.cn: 如果利率降不下来, 公司的前景可就不妙了。

means.word_mean: 是某人(自己)的问题；由某人(自己)负责

sentences.en: If he wants to invest all his money in one company, that’s his lookout.
sentences.cn: 如果他想把所有的钱都投到一家公司里，那是他自己的事。

sentences.en: It’s my own lookout if I fail this exam.
sentences.cn: 要是我这次考试不及格，那就是我自己的问题。

sentences.en: We’re always on the lookout for good computer programmers.
sentences.cn: 我们一直在物色优秀的计算机程序编制员。

sentences.en: I’m on the lookout for a good book on German history.
sentences.cn: 我想找一本关于德国历史的好书。
